statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM equipment_maintenance;
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_date, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT equipment_name, MAX(maintenance_date) AS latest_maintenance FROM equipment_maintenance GROUP BY equipment_name ORDER BY latest_maintenance DESC
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY equipment_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date < '2021-06-30' ORDER BY equipment_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_schedule <> 'None';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Log WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM Equipment
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Log
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM Maintenance_Log
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, notes FROM Equipment INNER JOIN Maintenance_Log ON Equipment.equipment_id = Maintenance_Log.equipment_id
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC, equipment_id ASC
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 5
SELECT maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 3 AND scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT maintenance_notes, maintenance_completed_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE schedule_id = 10
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Equipment
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment
SELECT equipment_id, next_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_interval > 30
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Technicians
SELECT technician_name FROM Maintenance_Technicians
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_interval FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_interval > 30;
SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, Maintenance_Logs.maintenance_date FROM Equipment JOIN Maintenance_Logs ON Equipment.equipment_id = Maintenance_Logs.equipment_id;
SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, Maintenance_Technicians.technician_name FROM Equipment, Maintenance_Technicians WHERE Equipment.equipment_id = Maintenance_Technicians.technician_id;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM Equipment JOIN Maintenance_History ON Equipment.equipment_id = Maintenance_History.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, name, location FROM equipment ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive';
SELECT technician_id, name, specialization FROM technicians WHERE specialization = 'Electrical';
SELECT log_id, log_date, description FROM maintenance_log ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT name, location FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT equipment_id, name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT m.schedule_id, m.maintenance_type, t.name AS technician_name FROM maintenance_schedule m JOIN technicians t ON m.technician_id = t.technician_id;

SELECT l.log_id, l.log_date, m.schedule_id, m.description, c.cost FROM maintenance_log l JOIN maintenance_schedule m ON l.schedule_id = m.schedule_id JOIN maintenance_cost c ON m.schedule_id = c.schedule_id ORDER BY l.log_date DESC;
